articles.content: (CNN) Por el número de demandas, la cobertura noticiosa por cable y todo el drama general que proviene de Florida en este momento, podrías pensar que los resultados de las votaciones para el Senado y la gobernación del estado penden de un hilo, tanto que cada… [+5309 chars]

articles.title: Clapper: Trump keeps raising bar for Saudis
articles.description: Former Director of National Intelligence James Clapper says it "stretches credulity" to think that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman wasn't directly involved in the killing of journalist Jamal Khashoggi.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.author: Steve Almasy, CNN
articles.title: Stan Lee's family said goodbye in private service; tribute in works
articles.description: Because Marvel Comics patriarch Stan Lee didn't want a large public funeral, his family held a private ceremony,  POW! Entertainment said Friday.
articles.content: (CNN) Because Marvel Comics patriarch Stan Lee didn't want a large public funeral, his family held a private ceremony, POW! Entertainment said Friday. A statement posted to the verified Twitter account of Stan Lee didn't mention when the event was held, but s… [+568 chars]

articles.title: CIA says Saudi crown prince ordered journalist's death: US official

articles.author: (CNNEspañol.com)
articles.title: CIA concluye que el príncipe saudí Bin Salman ordenó el asesinato de Khashoggi, confirma un funcionario
articles.description: La inteligencia de los Estados Unidos analizada por la CIA incluía una llamada telefónica que Khalid bin Salman, el hermano del príncipe, hizo a Khashoggi. Cinco sospechosos podrían ser condenados a la pena capital por la muerte de Jamal Khashoggi Revelan nue…
articles.content: (CNN) - Un alto funcionario estadounidense le dijo a CNN que la evaluación de la CIA sobre el asesinato de Jamal Khashoggi concluye que Mohammad bin Salman lo ordenó. La conclusión se basa en una combinación de la grabación proporcionada por los turcos y otra… [+1283 chars]

articles.author: macamilarincon
articles.title: Estos son lo trabajos con las tasas más altas de suicidio en Estados Unidos, según los CDC
articles.description: Las tasas de suicidio entre los estadounidenses en edad de trabajar aumentó un 34% de 2000 a 2016, según los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades. La entidad advierte que los lugares de empleo serían buenos aliados para ayudar en la prevenc…
articles.content: (CNN) Los hombres que trabajan en construcción y extracción registraron las tasas más altas de suicidio en Estados Unidos, según un informe publicado este jueves por los Centros para el Control y la Prevención de Enfermedades. En el caso de las mujeres, los m… [+3908 chars]

articles.author: Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: Republican Mia Love pulls ahead in Utah House race after Trump knocked her for losing
articles.description: Two-term Republican Rep. Mia Love on Friday took the lead over her Democratic challenger in Utah's 4th District House race more than a week after election night and after President Donald Trump mocked her for losing.

articles.title: De cumbres y contracumbres: la cumbre del G20 en Argentina
articles.description: [OPINIÓN] Brieger: "Si de azares se trata, la semana del 19 al 23 de noviembre se realizarán en Buenos Aires la octava conferencia del CLACSO y el Primer Foro Mundial del Pensamiento Crítico".

articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: What's next for CNN v. Trump?
articles.description: CNN won round one of its federal lawsuit against President Trump. But it was only round one. And no one knows how many more rounds there will be.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Donald Trump takes it personally
articles.description: Friday, while insisting he wasn't "agitated" by the ongoing Russia probe being led by Robert Mueller (HINT: He is!), President Donald Trump was asked why he felt so strongly about the investigation. And he said this:
articles.content: THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.author: Veronica Stracqualursi, CNN
articles.title: Report: CIA determines Saudi crown prince ordered Jamal Khashoggi's death
articles.description: The CIA has determined that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman personally ordered the killing of journalist Jamal Khashoggi, despite the Saudi government's denials that the de facto ruler was involved, according to a Washington Post report.
articles.content: (CNN) The CIA has determined that Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman personally ordered the killing of journalist Jamal Khashoggi, despite the Saudi government's denials that the de facto ruler was involved, according to a Washington Post report. Citing p… [+3084 chars]

articles.title: Navy SEAL charged with murder, shooting at noncombatants
articles.description: Navy SEAL Edward Gallagher is being charged by the Navy with stabbing and murdering a wounded person, shooting at noncombatants, posing for a photo and performing his re-enlistment ceremony next to a dead body.

articles.author: (CNNEspañol.com)
articles.title: El factor fundamental que enloquece a Trump sobre la investigación de Mueller
articles.description: Un tuit, una necesidad de controlar lo que no puede controlar y una investigación que sigue. Trump está acorralado y podría ser su peor enemigo.
articles.content: (CNN) - El presidente Donald Trump es un hombre acostumbrado a controlar totalmente su universo. Era el jefe y la cara más prominente de su imperio de negocios. Fue el director, y el rostro más prominente, de sus exitosos programas de reality: "The Apprentice… [+5783 chars]

articles.title: Actor learns how to 'floss' from cast mates
articles.description: Watch as actor Ted Danson takes on the dance craze, "flossing." His "The Good Place" cast mates tried to teach him the viral dance move.
